name: Daily Crypto Vol-Weighted ATR Trend Follower
description: Trend-following system that trades the most liquid crypto pairs on daily bars using a volatility-weighted ATR momentum breakout. Signals go long when the 14-50 day ATR-weighted momentum crosses above +0.5 and price is above its 50-day EMA; short when opposite. Risk is normalised so each trade risks 1.5 % equity via a 1.2×ATR stop. Initial profit target is 3.6×ATR (≈3:1 R-R) and, once reached, profits are locked with an ATR-based trailing stop (implemented here with dynamic ATR stop-loss updates).
